name: crud-clubs
description: crud app splitted in front end and back ends servers, front end serves react UX while backend serves all user related data

scripts.startLinux: gnome-terminal --tab -- bash -c "cd frontEnd && npm run start" & gnome-terminal --tab -- bash -c "cd backEnd && npm run dev:templateNodemon"
scripts.startWindows: start cmd /k "cd frontEnd && npm run start" & start cmd /k "cd backEnd && npm run dev:templateNodemon"

author: Timothy Burton
